# 1. Welcome to TSForge

TSForge is a **modern, production-grade forecasting toolkit** designed for:

- Professional forecasters  
- Data science teams  
- Enterprise forecasting systems  
- Students learning forecasting through Forecast Academy  

TSForge includes:

- Cleaning & preprocessing utilities  
- EDA & diagnostics  
- Feature engineering  
- Forecast evaluation  
- **High-grade visualization tools (Plotly-based)**  
- A consistent architecture designed for production and education  

This guide helps you install TSForge, load your first dataset, and run your first visualization.
